sentences.cn: 墙上的一只钟指着下午二点十分.

sentences.en: At 9 pm the prisoners are locked in for the night.
sentences.cn: 晚9时把犯人锁进牢房过夜.

sentences.en: I'm tied up in a meeting until 3 pm.
sentences.cn: 我开会直到下午叁点钟方可脱身.

sentences.en: It's eighteen hundred hours, ie 6 pm.
sentences.cn: 现在是十八点整(下午6点).

sentences.en: The city passed an ordinance compelling all outdoor lighting to be switched off at 9.00 PM.
sentences.cn: 该市通过一条法令强令晚上九点关闭一切室外照明.

sentences.en: The House ( ie Members of the House of Commons ) rose at 10 pm.
sentences.cn: 下议院已于晚上10点钟散会.

sentences.en: The lady at the tourist office told me it opened at 1 pm.
sentences.cn: 旅行社的那位小姐告诉我下午一点开门.

sentences.en: The night nurse is / goes on at 7 pm.
The PM pledged to make life better for the poorest families.
sentences.cn: 首相承诺改善最贫困家庭的生活状况。

sentences.en: The PM presided over a meeting of his inner Cabinet.
sentences.cn: 首相主持了一次核心内阁会议。
休闲健身中心晚上9点关门。

sentences.en: There is no parking between 9 am and 6 pm.
sentences.cn: 上午9时至下午6时禁止停放机动车辆.

sentences.en: They appeared on the dot of 9.50 pm as always.
sentences.cn: 他们和往常一样在晚上9点50分准时出现。

trans.tran_cn: 下午(Post Meridiem,等于afternoon)，调相(Phase Modulation)，(=prime minister)总理，首相，[化](=promethium)
